titles.title: O Trinity of Blessed Light
Thou Who Art Three in Unity

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Trinity of bless√®d light, O Unity of princely might, The fiery sun now goes his way; Shed Thou within our hearts a ray.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To Thee our morning song of praise, To Thee our evening prayer we raise; O grant us with Thy saints on high To praise Thee through eternity.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All laud to God the Father be, All praise, eternal Son, to Thee, All glory, as is ever meet, To God the holy Paraclete.
